Text: Thanks man, another fucking awesome job from Orbx. I just hate the fact they focus too much in these small airfields where I'm unable to land my NGX. :S
well at least we have a company making GA airfields.

@KevTheOne Btw, you can surely land an NGX on any of these airfields, you just need to know how to control them and how to stop in such short runways. ;-) I've done that on some of OrbX airfieds when I tried them. :-P
nice again, thanks ! and merry christmas to all fellow pilots...

Thank you for this first European Airport from orbx.
NZMF Milford Sound (first NZ Airport) is released.
Merry Xmas to all the FSX community.

I got confused, it is Chichester that is the first European ORBX Airport.
This one is the first for NRM
I appreciate it too, thank you for it
@Marklam_Voom You can't land a loaded 738 in such runways, and if you do, wouldn't be realistic at all.

Thanks for all your uploads Marklam_Voom, especially Orbx.  It is very much appreciated.

Here's wishing you and TPB a Happy 2013.
